formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetAccount' =-
[Synopsis] Set the CDR Account Code
[Description] SetAccount([account]): This application will set the channel account code for billing purposes. SetAccount has been deprecated in favor of the Set(CDR(accountcode)=account).

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
